info.description:
PyCurrency-Converter

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/SiddharthSaxena/PyCurrency-Converter.svg?branch=master
  :target: https://travis-ci.org/SiddharthSaxena/PyCurrency-Converter
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/pypi-v1.0-orange.svg?maxAge=3600&&style=flat
  :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyCurrency-Converter
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/version-v1.0-red.svg?maxAge=3600&&style=flat
  :target: https://github.com/SiddharthSaxena/PyCurrency-Converter/releases/tag/v1.0
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL--3.0-blue.svg?maxAge=3600&&style=flat
    :target: https://github.com/SiddharthSaxena/PyCurrency-Converter/blob/master/LICENSE

A python `library <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyCurrency-Converter>`__ to convert currency using `Google Finance <https://www.google.com/finance>`__.

Installation
------------

For Python 2 users:

::

  >>> pip install PyCurrency-Converter

For Python 3 users:

::

  >>> pip3 install PyCurrency-Converter

Alternatively you can install git clone this repository and install it via setup.py.

::

  >>> git clone https://github.com/SiddharthSaxena/PyCurrency-Converter.git
  >>> python setup.py install

Dependencies
------------

**BeautifulSoup**

::

  >>> sudo pip install bs4

**urllib**

::

  >>> sudo pip install urllib

Usage
-----

**Import**

::

  >>> import PyCurrency_Converter

**Get currency codes**

  >>> import PyCurrency_Converter
  >>> PyCurrency_Converter.codes()
  United Arab Emirates Dirham (AED)
  Afghan Afghani (AFN)
  Albanian Lek (ALL)

**Get exchange rate**


  >>> import PyCurrency_Converter
  >>> PyCurrency_Converter.convert(1, 'USD', 'INR')
  68.8122 INR

**General Format**

  >>> import PyCurrency_Converter
  >>> PyCurrency_Converter.convert(amount, from, to)
